name: Memorex AM/FM Top Loading CD Player | Portable Stereo with Programmable Memory | Auxiliary Input and LED Display (Black, CD Boombox)
short_description: ✅ DUAL PLAYBACK FUNCTIONALITY – CD SUPPORT: Enjoy the best of both worlds with a top-loading CD player (compatible with CD-R/RW) and a built-in auto-stop deck. Whether you're listening to classic mixtapes or modern CDs, this versatile stereo system delivers high-quality playback with effortless controls

✅ INTUITIVE MUSIC CONTROLS FOR EASY PLAYBACK: Navigate your music effortlessly with skip/search, forward/back, and repeat (1 or all) functions. The programmable memory lets you customize your listening experience, creating personalized playlists for uninterrupted enjoyment

✅ CLEAR AM/FM RADIO RECEPTION FOR MUSIC & NEWS: Stay connected to your favorite radio stations with the built-in AM/FM stereo receiver and telescopic antenna. Experience crisp, clear audio whether you're tuning into music, talk shows, or the latest news updates

✅ PORTABLE DESIGN WITH FLEXIBLE POWER OPTIONS: Designed for on-the-go listening, this compact stereo features a foldable carrying handle for easy portability. It operates with AC power (adapter included) or 6 ‘C’ batteries (not included), giving you the freedom to enjoy music anywhere—at home, in the park, or on road trips

✅ VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY & USER-FRIENDLY DISPLAY: The 3.5mm auxiliary input jack allows you to connect external devices like smartphones, MP3 players, or tablets for even more music options. The sleek red LED display provides clear CD track navigation, ensuring a hassle-free user experience

【Ideal for Present】The simple white outlook is suitable for yoga, gym exercise, home party, language learning, early learning and fetal education, perfect present for kids, elders, parents, friends and pregnant women etc. Package included: 1* power cord, 1* power plug, 1*remote control, 1*user manual, 1* audio cable, 1* desk bracket, 1* wall mount backboard, 1*screw accessories.

name: MEGATEK Portable CD Boombox with FM Stereo Radio, Bluetooth, USB Port, and Backlit LCD Display | CD-R/CD-RW/MP3-CD Compatible | AUX Input | Headphone Jack | Programmable CD Player - Black
short_description: Simple and Stylish: This CD boombox features large buttons and a backlit LCD display, making it easy-to-operate. It’s compact, simple, and stylish design fits right in your trendy home. Perfect for enjoying your favorite music at home, in the shop, or while on the go.
Crisp Stereo Sound: Dual premium 3” front-firing speakers deliver clear and well-balanced stereo sound. 5 integrated equalizer (EQ) modes allow you to fine-tune the sound to your liking.
Top-loading CD player: Playback your favorite CDs, CD-R/RW, MP3 CDs and audiobook CDs, with shuffle and repeat functions.

FM Radio: The built-in FM tuner with digital tuning and 30 station presets makes it easy to listen to and save your favorite news, talk or music radio stations. The FM antenna has been upgraded for better reception.
Bluetooth Wireless: Pair your phone/tablet or other Bluetooth devices to this boom box to wirelessly stream your favorite music and podcasts, with stable connection and extended wireless range.
USB Player: Conveniently play MP3 or WMA music files recorded on your USB flash drives, with a maximum supported capacity upgraded to 128 GB (FAT32 format only, exFAT/NTFS not supported).

User-Friendly: A 3.5mm auxiliary (aux) input allows easy wired music connectivity; A headphone jack provides a private listening experience; Resume function lets you pick up where you left off any time; Easy-to-read backlit LCD display; Large volume dial and FM dial on the top; and more.

AC/Battery Operated: Power supply 1 x AC power cord (100-240 VAC, 50/60 Hz) or 4 x R14/Size C dry batteries (6 VDC); Requires 4 C Batteries (not included); Best with alkaline batteries. (Remote control is not included.)

short_description: SMALL DESIGN: Fits in your favorite small room, not recommended for large spaces. Take with you indoors, or out and listen to your favorite music at home or in the shop. Runs on home poweror 6 C batteries,

KEY FEATURES: Enjoy your music with this top loading Magnavox CD boombox with AM/FM stereo radio. The aux input allows connection to any device. The boombox is CD-R/CD-RW compatible and has an AC/DC adapter. It’s powered by 6 C batteries (not included)

QUALITY: We are committed to making products to meet the needs of our customers. For all of our high-tech devices, we strive to make quality products at the lowest prices. All of our products are built using high-quality materials for long-lasting use

PERFORMANCE: The Magnavox brand is ubiquitous on popular products found in households around the world. Even in today’s rapidly changing markets consumers continue to choose our products to enjoy the values it stands for; high performance at smart price.
This unit does not work with Bluetooth and does not have a headphone jack
product_description: Enjoy music your way with the Magnavox CD Boombox. This features a compact, portable design that is able to keep up with the fast paced world that we all live in. Listen to your favorite music in a variety of ways including CD's, AM/FM radio stations, or connect to your phone/MP3 player with an AUX cord. Great for at home use, or take it on-the-go with the option of powering it with 6 C batteries (not included). Key Features Include: Top loading CD player CD-R/CD-RW Compatible Total 2 x 0.8W RMS output Programmable CD player AM/FM stereo radio LED display Connect to any audio device via 3.5mm aux in port AC operation (AC adapter included) DC operation (uses 6 x C size batteries, not included) Magnavox celebrating 100 years of sound and visual Quality. The Magnavox brand originates back to 1917 when the World’s first moving coil speaker was invented in a lab in Napa, California. Due to this invention for the first time in human history the world witnessed a human voice that could be heard by an entire town. The product was named: Magnavox ~ Latin for ‘Great Voice’ It became a prime piece of US history and the foundation of a trusted brand for almost a century linked to dozens of notable achievements such as the first game console (Magnavox Odyssey) as well as World’s first plasma computer panels. Throughout the years Magnavox’s visual appearance took several forms relevant to its time. Ranging from multiple revisions of its initial appearance (the historic great voice featuring a lion’s head), a shield covering the history of the brand and its influence on entertainment, into a contemporary wordmark in 1982 and the wordmark it is today. The popularity of the Magnavox brand is as strong as ever before and its remarkable history attracts many fans and non-profit organizations.

name: PHILCO Personal CD Player with 60 Second Anti-Shock - Portable, Compact, and Easy to Use - Includes Headphones
short_description: CD Player Portable: The PHILCO Personal CD Player offers a small cd player design, making it an ideal choice for a personal cd player portable that fits easily in your bag or pocket.
Portable CD Player for Car: Enhance your car journeys with this cd player for car, featuring a 60-second anti-shock feature, ensuring smooth playback and portability.
Portable CD Player with Headphones: Enjoy your favorite music on-the-go with this portable cd player, providing high-quality audio and convenience in one package.
Personal CD Player: The PHILCO Personal CD Player combines ease of use, programmability, and connectivity with a stereo headphone jack for a versatile cd portable player experience.
Mini CD Player: With its compact size, battery-operated functionality, and compatibility with Audio CD, CD-R/RW formats, this mini cd player is perfect for music lovers who value portability.
product_description: Discover the PHILCO Personal CD Player, a portable cd player designed for the music enthusiast who values portability and ease of use. This small cd player is perfect for use at home, in the car, or on-the-go. Enjoy your favorite tunes in high quality with this personal cd player portable, which comes with headphones for your convenience. Key Features: Shock Resistant: This cd player portable is built to withstand the rigors of daily use, ensuring that your music won't skip a beat. 60 Second ESP: The cd portable player is equipped with a 60-second electronic skip protection (ESP) feature, ensuring smooth playback even when you're on the move. Top Loading CD Player: Easily load your favorite Audio CD, CD-R/RW discs into this portable cd player with headphones for quick and hassle-free music enjoyment. Programmable: Create custom playlists with the programmable feature, allowing you to listen to your favorite tracks in the order you prefer. Connectivity: This portable cd players device features a stereo headphone jack, making it compatible with most headphones and audio systems. Battery Operated: Powered by two AA batteries (not included), this mini cd player provides hours of uninterrupted listening pleasure. AC Adapter Not Included: Please note that an AC adapter is not included with this personal cd player. What's in the Box: The package includes the CD player, stereo earbuds, and instructions for use, making it a perfect gift for yourself or your loved ones. Experience the freedom of taking your favorite music wherever you go with the PHILCO Personal CD Player. With its portable design, shock resistance, and 60-second ESP, you can enjoy your music without any interruptions. Order your personal cd player with headphones today and rediscover the joy of listening to CDs at home, in your car, or on-the-go!
